channel.title: Gloves Help
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering how do i make the gloves like rune gloves, mith, barrows, (the ones u get from RPD in real rs) how do i make those gloves in my server show up like real rs. Cause right now they are really tiny and they dont go up at all there just like little balls, ive played on a server before that has them fixed where they are just like rs. Can anyone explain how to make it like that?
thanks

item.title: Gloves Help
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_II Diablo II
item.description:
@Diablo_II wrote:

yeh i put the silab item id and the normal id into the spot thats titled like “int gloves” and yes thats what i want to happen is for them to appear like rs.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 11:40:12 AM[/size][hr]please help me out here m8’s thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Gloves Help
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_II Diablo II
item.description:
@Diablo_II wrote:

ok what i want is a explanation on why the barrows/rune/mith/iron/addy/black gloves in servers are not like the ones in REAL RS, In the “Real RS” they come up the arm a little ways but in private servers they dont they are just like little stubs but i have seen many servers that have it so its fixed like “Real RS”. How do u do it?

Read full topic
